20 Local <Value> getValue(std::string const &name, Local <Object> sourceObject) {
21  if (sourceObject.IsEmpty()) {
22  auto msg = std::string(
23  "getValue: sourceObject is empty/does not exist; trying to get value name=" + name).c_str();
24  std::cout << msg << std::endl;
25 
26  ThrowTypeError(msg);
27  }
28 
29  Local <String> localName = Nan::New<String>(name).ToLocalChecked();
30  Local <Value> value = sourceObject->Get(localName);
31  if (value->IsUndefined()) {
32  auto msg = std::string("getValue method in ssmt.h: " + name + " not present in sourceObject").c_str();
33  std::cout << "getValue: " << msg << std::endl;
34 
35  ThrowTypeError(msg);
36  }
37  return value;
38 }
39 
46 Local <Object> getObject(std::string const &name, Local <Object> sourceObject) {
47  Local <Value> value = getValue(name, sourceObject);
48  return value->ToObject();
49 }
50 
56 Local <Object> getObject(std::string const &name) {
57  return getObject(name, inp);
58 }
59 
66 double getDouble(std::string const &name, Local <Object> sourceObject) {
67  Local <Value> value = getValue(name, sourceObject);
68  return value->NumberValue();
69 }
70

77  return getDouble(name, inp);
78 }

87  Local <Value> value = getValue(name, sourceObject);
88  return value->BooleanValue();
89 }

108  return value->IntegerValue();

126 Local <Array> getArray(std::string const &name, Local <Object> sourceObject) {
127  Local <Value> value = getValue(name, sourceObject);
128  Local <Array> array = Local<Array>::Cast(value);
129 
130  return array;
131 }

133 void setRobject(std::string const &name, double number, Local <Object> obj) {
134  Local <String> localName = Nan::New<String>(name).ToLocalChecked();
135  Local <Number> localNumber = Nan::New<Number>(number);
136  Nan::Set(obj, localName, localNumber);
137 }
138 
139 void setR(std::string const &name, double number) {
140  setRobject(name, number, r);
141 }
